About FWRP

A better way to reduce food waste

FWRP is a comprehensive platform designed to help individuals, businesses, and communities minimize food waste, save money, and contribute to a more sustainable future.

Features

A better way to reduce food waste

Eco-Friendly

Reduce your carbon footprint by minimizing food waste in your community.

Community Sharing

Connect with local organizations to donate excess food efficiently.

Efficient Distribution

Streamline the process of getting surplus food to those in need.
